text: Tarapara allah ekati kakake niyukta karalena mati acamrate yena take dekhano yaya kemana ka’re se tara bha'iyera mrtadeha dhakabe. Se balale -- ''haya durbhagya! Ami ki e'i kakera mato habara jan'ya eta'i durbala haye gechi, kaje'i ami yena amara bha'iyera saba dhakate pari?’’ Sejan'ya paramuhurte se halo anutaptadera dalera
